Title: Four Sisters and a Wedding
Writer: Vanessa R. Valdez (story), Vanessa R. Valdez (screenplay), Jose Javier Reyes (based on an original screenplay)
Actors: Brenna Garcia, Bea Basa, Veyda Inoval, Arbey Alegado
Plot: Four sisters try to stop the wedding of their younger brother and in doing so, all discover resentments among each other.
